title: News digest [No. 12]
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Horses and hounds “meet” at Oaklands Hunt Club for fiftieth year; model steam engines run on backyard tracks; Melbourne’s model boat club members control hand-made miniatures by radio; gliders of the Wimmera Soaring Club soar up to 1,100 feet; for the film fan variety is provided by the Echuca Regional Library; Austrian instructors and modern lodges attract many skiers to Falls Creek.
